title: Megan Barton-Hanson looks strikingly different with new locks in raunchy photo
text:

Love Island 's Megan Barton-Hanson has switched up her hair in order to transform her appearance.

The former stripper, 25, pre-warned her social media fans ahead of unveiling her new look by sharing a post onto her Instagram story.

Her hair stylist had penned reading: "Keep your eyes peeled for @meganbartonhanson transformation today".

Megan followed up the post with a raunchy snap posted to her grid where she flaunted her latest hair-do.

Ditching her short and sleek bob, that she had previously commented mirrored that of Pulp Fiction's Mia Wallace, Megan's offering showed her modelling long brunette locks that tumbled down her shoulders.

Looking every inch the vixen, the Celebs Go Dating star posed in a saucy black lace bra that featured a sexy cut out detailing across her ample assets.

Megan continued her sizzling look with a face of heavy make-up including a berry red pout and layers of false eye-lashes.

(Image: Instagram)

In a second upload the reality TV star wore a red leopard print blazer atop of her bra as she looked seductively down the camera lens.

The bombshell informed fans in the post that she had been gifted hair extensions and that they were to thank for her change in style.

It comes after the star revealed how she got into stripping, and how another woman showed her the ropes.

Megan was working in a law firm on minimum wage when she saw her first strip show, which inspired her to change jobs.

She marched into the nearest club and asked for a job where she was taught how to strip by a dancer who gave her a lap dance.

(Image: BACKGRID)

Speaking in a video posted to her Instagram account, Megan said: "My first ever strip was so daunting. I'm not gonna lie, I was so nervous and geeky at school, and even now to stand up and speak in front of a crowd of people I'd be terrified.

"Obviously to get up and take your clothes off and dance, I didn't have any dance background, I danced like a dad at a disco.

"But I just knew I wanted to earn money and I wanted to really push myself.

"When I first went in I got a girl to show me what to do so I got a lap dance and then I did it back to her and copied and that was my first experience giving a lap dance."

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: David Fisher/REX/Shutterstock)

Megan described all the dancers as a "sisterhood" who looked out for each other from some of the unpleasant customers.

Initially she kept her new job a secret from her parents but eventually told her mum, who was devastated.

She added: "At first I didn't tell my parents I was stripping.

"I told my mum I was gonna be a waitress in a strip club and she was like 'Why Meg? People are gonna talk, it's such a small area around here, people are gonna talk, don't do it.'

"Then I came out with 'No I actually am stripping' and she started crying, and I was like 'Oh god.'

"After a week of working there, I'm really stubborn, I knew I was gonna do it.

"She could see how happy I was, I handed my notice in for my legal PA job and life just changed."
description: The Love Island beauty, who often switches up her look, has once again transformed
